snippet.title: Column on the Sea: Gameplay
snippet.description:
BUY COLUMN ON THE SEA:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147280/Column_on_the_Sea/

Column on the Sea is a comedic Metroidvania game released Friday, September 27th, for the personal computer. The game is the result of a successful Kickstarter campaign, which can be found here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1242842625/column-on-the-sea-a-comedy-metroidvania-game/description

This is some gameplay footage for the upcoming release, covering parts of a dungeon, the Glacial Generator. In this video, main character Laika learns a new ability and uses it to get a few new upgrades. This video also shows part of a boss fight.
